question: Is there a duaa so that someone accepts a marriage proposal
answer:
QUESTION
My family have asked the hand of marriage for a girl that I know,but her father has refused three times even though he knows that I read namaz and quran, people have spoken to him so many times but he has to much pride and refuses for no reason, is there a special duaa that I can read so that he changes his mind .
ANSWER


Share:
If the girl is destined for you. Allah Ta'ala will grant her to you. If she
is not destined for you, you will never get her.

Many people have spoken to the girl's father, your family proposed for her
many times and the proposal was rejected. It is our humble advise that you
maintain your dignity and accept the refusal. It is possible your obsession
for the girl may lead to the loss of self respect and you may not even get
the girl.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
